content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price to see where it goes. I'm thinking of 1000 euros per month. Remember, I want the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a responsible tenant I seek an affordable rate for this one-bedroom apartment considering my budget and financial situation. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
